data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Harju to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Harju, Estonia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Harju who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary: On average, 65 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Harju, Estonia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, help your children in Harju, Estonia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, help the 28,597 believers in Harju to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Harju, Estonia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 28,597 believers in Harju.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Harju. Through your servants plant 121 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
